    #include<stdio.h>
    int sum(int n)
    {
    int s=0,x;
    while(n>0)
    {
    x=n%10;
    n=n/10;
    s=s+x;
    }
    return s;
    }
    int main()
    {
    int t,n,i,j;
    char ch;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(j=1;j<n;j++)
    {
    if((j+sum(j))==n)
    {
    printf("%d\n",j);
    break;
    }
    else if(j==n-1)
    printf("NONE\n");
    }
    }
    return 0;
    }
